name: Badge
description: A badge is a small status indicator or label that can display text, icons, or numbers to highlight an item or convey status information.

props.name: appearance
props.description: Badge appearance style - filled: solid background, ghost: transparent background, outline: outlined border, tint: subtle background

props.name: color
props.description: Semantic color for the badge indicating different types of status or importance

props.name: iconPosition
props.description: Position of the icon relative to the badge content

props.name: shape
props.description: Shape of the badge - circular: fully rounded, rounded: slightly rounded corners, square: sharp corners

props.name: size
props.description: Size of the badge affecting padding and font size

props.name: icon
props.description: Icon to display within the badge

subComponents.name: CounterBadge
subComponents.description: A badge specialized for displaying numeric counts with overflow handling

props.name: appearance
props.description: Counter badge appearance - filled or ghost style only

props.name: count
props.description: Numeric value displayed by the badge

props.name: dot
props.description: If true, displays a dot without the count

props.name: overflowCount
props.description: Maximum number to display before showing overflow indicator (e.g., 99+)

props.name: showZero
props.description: Whether to show the badge when count is 0

subComponents.name: PresenceBadge
subComponents.description: A badge that indicates user presence status with predefined status options

props.name: outOfOffice
props.description: Indicates that the user is out of office. Can be combined with any status
